Articles.Content: G'day new around here and i have noticed that people have rovers and such things in vids and pics. were do i get em and can folks suggest good ones to have a play around with ?

Bobcat's DEMV Mk 5 and his other rover are very well made. Here is a link.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-demv-mk-5-ant/
Be aware that the mkV rover cannot use that HOME recon unit / garage

If your creative and mechanically minded, then have a look at TT's Modular Wheels Plugin, this plugin powered addon gives you tons of truck wheels to play around with. Its in the spaceport @ http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/modular-multiwheels-and-omniwheels/
